summary: Figma plugin is connected to channel 'pvv7r6ph' in Figma, but MCP server in Cursor cannot join the channel yet because join_channel tool is not available. User needs to restart Cursor to refresh MCP tools. Socket server is running on port 3055 and MCP server is active.
current_status: Waiting for Cursor restart to refresh MCP tools. Once restart is done, I can join channel 'pvv7r6ph' and start reading Figma designs to complete the homepage implementation.
